contents.item: If Nigeria will change for the better, then we must take responsibility for the changes in Nigeria.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: Go all the way and let your soul be in what you are doing and there will be no limitations.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: It is an insult to live in the fear of darkness.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: The teaching of godliness must be preached and taught in every available medium.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: Be watchful of the dangers of pleasure.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita

contents.item: Your level of knowledge will determine the level at which God relates with you.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: What bothers you today or gives you concerns could be a signpost to your purpose in life.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: God has no regard for the ignorant.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: Believe that your life is not ordinary and never look down on what you can do to impact a life.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: Lack of knowledge leads to rejection by God.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: Discover what you need to do to make your life have meaning.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: Never misuse your God-given opportunities, it may be the path to fulfilling your destiny.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: Ignorance is darkness.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: When we neglect knowledge, we have indirectly rejected light.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: When there is no personal responsibility in any society, there cannot be a responsible government.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: Greed is an excessive desire for something more than one’s proper share.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: It is like we are having a harvest of destruction in our society due to ignorance.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: There is always a great price to pay for irresponsibility.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: Limitations in life are caused by ignorance.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: Whatever your passion, make sure you hold unto a philosophy that is bigger and greater than you.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: Your resources could go to where your hands could not reach.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: When everybody contributes a change to what he or she notices, it is then we will change our world.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: There is no one that cannot make an impact in this world.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: When you are pushed to the wall, you will act and do things you have never done before.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: Godliness has already come in human flesh to rescue humanity from its own ungodliness.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: God cannot help you in your ignorance.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: You are a lawmaker in your own right.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: If you are frustrated with the elite of your society, do something about it.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: The number one price of ignorance is destruction.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: You need to discover something that will impact humanity.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: Ignorance leads to leaving in self-deception.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: When we live in ignorance, we live in darkness and that is where the devil rules.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: The philosophy of a person speaks of what dictates or governs how and what someone believes.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: Serving others is one of the bases for you to have or to enjoy a fullness of purpose in life.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja

contents.item: Man armed with science is like a baby with a box of matches.
contents.owner: J.B.S. Haldane, Daedalus

contents.item: Anyone that will make a difference would have to put others ahead of them put others first.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: To serve others is not only by hands but by mouth as well.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: When you reject knowledge, God rejects you.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: God has no tolerance for ignorance therefore we should not have tolerance for ignorance also.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: Your purpose is more than just being happy, but it’s about making others to be blessed and happy.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: Covetousness gives birth to violence, while violence gives birth to oppression.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: When you see injustice among the nations, you will find out that the root cause is covetousness.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: We are the author of our own destruction.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: There is a commanded blessing on anyone that values, esteems and stands for justice in society.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: God loves justice and He desires mankind to love the same.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: The Lord is concerned about the poor receiving justice and that they are not neglected or cheated.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: Fight against illiteracy.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: There is satisfaction in serving.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: The only thing destroying us is ignorance.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: In the pursuit of wholeness, there will surely be challenges but you need to keep going.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: The law or any practice that is not for the good of the people must be changed.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: We have to make it a personal responsibility to eradicate ignorance from our society.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: Knowledge acted upon makes all the difference, produces the different results we have in life.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: Your voice can be made loud to speak against ungodliness and injustice and not promote it.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: When insulted by injustice, face it, stand up against it and demand your right and justice.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: Each individual needs to be pregnant with the seed of purpose.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: Your voice could go to where your feet could not go.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: To be honorable, you have to make sacrifices for others.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: Our passion, even our insult, could be turned into a blessing.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: Responsible government is an off shoot of a culture of personal responsibility.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: A leader must be taught or made to know the importance of justice for the people.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: Ignorance leads to low income.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: Illiteracy is simply the inability to read and write.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: The absence of justice anywhere is the presence of injustice everywhere.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: Don’t underestimate the result of a right and positive anger.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: Ungodliness has always declared war on godliness.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: A troubled soul is a troubled life.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: For you to be able to turn on the light in the darkness, you have to live in the light.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: Light generates life and causes it to grow.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: You are enough to drive a saint to madness or a king to his knees.
contents.owner: Grace Willows, To  Kiss a King

contents.item: You may be the change and light needed by others, to shine on their path.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: Make sure you speak out and loud enough to be heard.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: Illiteracy breeds more ignorance than you can ever begin to imagine.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: Ignorance is what is destroying us and not the devil.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja

contents.item: A voice of one insulted by injustice will make others to be delivered from the same injustice.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: The devil has no power over us except in our area of ignorance.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: Nothing in the whole world is more dangerous than ignorance.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: Unless we learn to know ourselves, we run the danger of destroying ourselves.
contents.owner: Ja A. Jahannes, WordSong Poets

contents.item: Individuals with greed for power see others as elements to be oppressed.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: As a result of this greed for power, the poor is not only silenced but also oppressed.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: The price of ignorance is usually a life of frustration and destruction.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: God is reciprocally responding to the cry of the afflicted.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: The only power the devil has is in our area of ignorance.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: Everything in the society that is wrong is our responsibility to fix.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: The devil will do anything for you to be comfortable in your ignorance.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: The oppressor will always despise their victims.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: Every individual has a role to play for the betterment of our nation.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: The devil is the reason for all the problems we have in the society.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: Godliness is not just a doctrine, a belief or a principle, it has a personality.
contents.owner: Sunday Adelaja, The Mountain of Ignorance

contents.item: Cheap little rhymesA cheap little tuneAre sometimes as dangerousAs a sliver of the moon.
contents.owner: Langston Hughes
